name: Datrics
headline: A tool to create AI-powered ð¤ digital coworkers for BI and analytics.
description:
Datrics.ai transforms enterprise sales and finance operations with an AI-powered digital coworker, streamlining complex analyses into simple conversations. Imagine a bank CFO querying, 'How did our loan performance this quarter compare to the last?' and instantly receiving detailed, visual analyses directly via MS Teams chat. This revolutionizes tasks that were once time-consuming and complex.

Our vision is to cultivate a vast ecosystem of digital coworkers, enabling businesses to harness the power of data-driven decisions effortlessly.

At the core of Datrics lies our unique low-code data workflow automation platform, designed to simplify data handling for digital analysts. This platform empowers analytics teams to dive into data exploration and blending, uncover insights, and create automated workflows and dashboards for sharing insights â all without the need for coding.
tags: industry:finance; industry:b2b; industry:analytics; industry:no-code; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

# Deliver automated conversational analytics to your users.
Full stack data processing, AI Analytics and chat capabilities that can take you from ideas to production in weeks. Let our platform, supported by our data scientists help you form and deliver your AI strategy. 
[Request free trial](https://datrics.ai/</request-trial>)
[Book a call with us](https://datrics.ai/</contact-us>)
![MacBook mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b062b30cd76f97a62e0c01/67489c65e3adc405be7f416e_chat-window.png)
## AI Agents Transforming Industries
### For Software Companies
Embed intelligent analytics directly into your product
Enhance user experience with AI-powered insights
Increase customer satisfaction and retention
Automate data analysis and reporting
### For Recruitment & HR
25% faster hiring processes through intelligent candidate matching
Analyze thousands of profiles in seconds
Predict candidate success and cultural fit
Automate routine screening tasks
### For Sales & Marketing
Real-time pipeline analysis and predictions
Pricing and Packaging optimization
Automated conversion rate optimization
Intelligent lead scoring and prioritization
Customer behavior pattern recognition
### For Financial Services
Automated financial analysis and reporting
Realtime Credit evaluation and scoring
Real-time risk assessment
Pattern detection in transaction data
Compliance monitoring and alerts
# Datrics AI is Built for Business Users
Say goodbye to complex integrations and lengthy projects. Datrics AI Platform and AI Analyst is a secure toolkit that uses Advanced AI to process your data, learn your unique terminology, workflows and metrics and delivers instant actionable insights.
Meet the companies we are working with
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b062b30cd76f97a62e0c01/67487838eb11339a772c3439_Kraft%20Heinz%20Color%20Logo%201.svg)](https://datrics.ai/<https:/www.kraftheinzcompany.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b062b30cd76f97a62e0c01/674877e6e3b4ed0f923b7587_tbi%20bank%20-%20%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%BE%20%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%2C%20%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B8%20%D0%B8%20%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%20%D1%81%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BA%D0%B8.%20-%20tbi%20bank-1.svg)](https://datrics.ai/<https:/tbibank.com>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b062b30cd76f97a62e0c01/66857af6e2e04191ab90c9da_bear.svg)](https://datrics.ai/<https:/bearclaw.io>)
# Instantly access insights across every stage of your data analysis
## 24/7 Operation
Your AI Analyst works round the clock, continuously monitoring data and generating insights without human supervision.
### Intelligent Learning
Gets smarter with every interaction, learning your business context, terminology, and specific needs.
### Multi-Source Analysis
Connects and analyzes data from all your sources, providing a complete picture of your business.
### Predictive Intelligence
Identifies trends, forecasts outcomes, and alerts you to opportunities and risks before they materialize.
[Request free trial](https://datrics.ai/</request-trial>)
[Book a demo](https://datrics.ai/</contact-us>)

## Embed Datrics within your existing data infrastructure 
or use Datrics in our secure hosted environment
### Embedded solution
Our flexible API-first architecture allows you to seamlessly integrate AI-powered financial analytics directly into your existing applications with full customization and branding control.
### Cloud platform
Access all of Datrics powerful features through our secure hosted environment.
### On-premise
Integrate seamlessly with your existing security protocols while meeting the strictest compliance requirements in the banking industry.

# Security & Compliance
## Data Encryption
Sensitive data is encrypted during transmission and storage using strong encryption protocols like TLS 1.2+ and AES-256.
### Audit Trails and Monitoring
Maintain detailed activity logs for auditing and use real-time monitoring tools for prompt threat detection and response.
### No External Data Sharing
Rest assured that your data never leaves your infrastructure. We don't access, share, or sell your data to any third parties.
### Advanced Access Controls
Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) to ensure users have the minimum necessary access required for their roles. Use multi-factor authentication (MFA) to enhance login security, especially for administrative accounts. 
### On-Prem Installation
Deploy Datrics within your own secure environment for maximum privacy and control.
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62b062b30cd76f97a62e0c01/673f4ced5bbee0face0b7407_mockup-placeholder-03.png)

generated_description:
### Overview of Datrics

**Company Name**: Datrics  
**Founded**: 2020  
**Location**: San Francisco  
**Team Size**: 22 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: W21  
**Website**: [datrics.ai](https://datrics.ai)

---

### Mission and Vision

Datrics is on a mission to simplify business intelligence (BI) and analytics through AI-powered digital coworkers. By enabling companies to transform complex data analysis into straightforward, conversational interactions, they strive to cultivate a vast ecosystem that accelerates data-driven decision-making. Picture a bank CFO asking, "How did our loan performance this quarter compare to the last?" and instantly receiving visual insights via chat—Datrics is making this a reality.

---

### Core Offering

At the heart of Datrics' offering is a low-code data workflow automation platform. This unique tool is designed to empower digital analysts by making data handling simpler and more intuitive. Users can explore, blend data, uncover insights, and create automated workflows or dashboards—all without writing a single line of code.

### Features:
- **Natural Language Processing**: Users can interact with data using regular conversational prompts.
- **Automated Insights**: The AI continuously learns and provides insights in real-time, optimizing data processing for finance and business operations.
- **Multi-Source Analysis**: Integrates data from various platforms for comprehensive insights.

---

### Strategic Partnerships and Use Cases

Datrics has seen success across various sectors by partnering with leading companies. For example:
- **Bear Claw**: An applicant tracking system enhanced using Datrics' AI to improve hiring processes.
- **Financial Institutions**: Datrics has helped streamline operations and overcome data-related challenges, leading to more strategic insights.

---

### Key Areas of Focus

Datrics is making waves in several industries:
- **Finance**: Automating financial analysis and risk assessment.
- **Recruitment & HR**: Leveraging AI for candidate matching and onboarding processes.
- **Sales & Marketing**: Enhancing sales strategies through real-time analytics and predictions.

---

### Security and Compliance

Datrics emphasizes security with strong practices:
- Data encryption during transmission and storage.
- Advanced access controls and regular auditing.
- Options for on-premise installation to meet strict compliance requirements.

---

### Why Choose Datrics?

Investing in Datrics can yield significant ROI—averaging a 40% return within the first six months. With Datrics, businesses not only save time on data reporting, reducing it by up to 90%, but they also gain the ability to spot opportunities more swiftly and scale analytics across teams.

---

If you're looking to empower your organization with intelligent analytics and improve your decision-making processes, explore Datrics today by visiting [datrics.ai](https://datrics.ai) or booking a free demo.
